Trade/Device Name(s): VITROS XT Chemistry Products TBIL-ALKP Slides
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITROS XT Chemistry Products TBIL-ALKP Slides for quantitative measurement of total bilirubin and alkaline phosphatase in serum and plasma.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of total bilirubin concentration and alkaline phosphatase activity in serum and plasma for diagnosis and treatment of liver, hematological, metabolic, bone, parathyroid, and intestinal diseases.
